headline.main: BULGARIA PLEDGES PEACE IN BALKANS; Nation Will Not Go to War to Gain Revision of Borders, It Is Reported in Sofia AXIS SAID TO FEAR CRISIS Russia Held to Have Requested Right to Participate in the Dardanelles Defense

lead_paragraph: SOFIA, Bulgaria, June 30--According to reliable reports, Bulgaria has assured Yugoslavia that she will not attack Rumania no matter what happens. At the same time a source close to King Boris told this correspondent that even if Hungary attempts forcibly to seize Transylvania Bulgaria will not move.
